CustomField.description: The type of the input for a lightning input component. Valid values are checkbox, checkbox-button, color, date, datetime, time, email, file, password, range, search, tel, url, number, and toggle. This value defaults to text.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The type of the input for a lightning input component. Valid values are checkbox, checkbox-button, color, date, datetime, time, email, file, password, range, search, tel, url, number, and toggle. This value defaults to text.
CustomField.label: Lightning Input Type
